frontmatter.title: Combinatorial Search
frontmatter.description: Let's look at a concept that be used in a future post to find all possible piano voicings for a given chord.

/* Tree */
.rd3t-tree-container {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.rd3t-grabbable {
  cursor: move; /* fallback if grab cursor is unsupported */
  cursor: grab;
  cursor: -moz-grab;
  cursor: -webkit-grab;
}
.rd3t-grabbable:active {
    cursor: grabbing;
    cursor: -moz-grabbing;
    cursor: -webkit-grabbing;
}

/* Node */
.rd3t-node {
  cursor: pointer;
  fill: #777;
  stroke: #000;
  stroke-width: 2;
}

.rd3t-leaf-node {
  cursor: pointer;
  fill: transparent;
  stroke: #000;
  stroke-width: 2;
}

.rd3t-label__title {
  stroke: #000;
  stroke-width: 1;
}

.rd3t-label__attributes {
  stroke: #777;
  stroke-width: 1;
  font-size: smaller;
}

/* Link */
.rd3t-link {
  fill: none;
  stroke: #000;
}
